questions.text: How well does the notebook describe the Dandiset? If you are not familiar with the Dandiset, you should assume that the description is accurate and rate it based on the quality of the description.

options.label: Not at all or very poorly

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to load information about the Dandiset?

options.label: Not at all or very poorly

questions.text: How well does the notebook show how to load basic meta information from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: Not at all or very poorly

questions.text: How many different types of (non-meta) data are loaded from the NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: Three or more types of data are loaded
Two types of data are loaded
One type of data is loaded
No data is loaded or loading is poor

questions.text: How many different types of data visualizations are shown in the notebook?

options.label: Three or more types of data visualizations are presented
Two types of data visualizations are presented
One type of data visualization is presented
No data is visualized or visualization is poor

questions.text: Does the notebook create an advanced visualization involving multiple types of data from an NWB file in the Dandiset?

options.label: At least one high quality advanced visualization is shown
No advanced visualization is shown or visualization is ineffective

questions.text: What is the quality of the plots in the notebook?

options.label: Excellent: Plots are generally of excellent quality. They make a point about the data, are easily interpretable, and do not contain unnecessary elements.
Good: Plots are generally of good quality. They show an interpretable sample of data but are not very informative or refined.
Bad: Plots are missing or are generally not interpretable or show misleading information

questions.text: Are there issues with the plots in the notebook?
Is there unnecessary redundancy between the plots in the notebook?

options.label: At least one major redundancy between plots
Two or more major redundancies between plots

questions.text: Are there unsupported interpretations of the plots or results in the notebook?

options.label: Two or more major unsupported interpretations

questions.text: Are there other issues with the notebook?

options.label: At least one major other issue
Two or more major other issues

questions.text: What is your overall rating of the effectiveness of this notebook for getting started loading, visualizing, and analyzing this Dandiset?
